{"id":994085354,"question_id":29,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"11Â months","timestamp":1689317423,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/994085354/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Divide Two Integers","memory":"39.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int divide(int dividend, int divisor) {\n     \n        // huifeng wodage https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZDqsq648i8c\n        \n        long a = dividend;\n        long b = divisor;\n        boolean sign = (a>0==b>0) ? false : true;\n        \n        long res =0;\n        \n        a = Math.abs(a);\n        b = Math.abs(b);\n        \n        \n        \n        while(a>=b){\n            long c = b;\n            long cnt = 1;\n            \n            while((c<<1)<=a){\n                c = c<<1;\n                cnt = cnt <<1;\n            }\n            a-=c;\n            res+=cnt;\n        }\n        \n        if(sign)\n            return (int)-res;\n        \n        if(res >= Integer.MAX_VALUE)\n            return Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n        \n        return (int)res;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"divide-two-integers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
